moduleMeta.name: layerInterflow
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: vertical soil water movement using Rechards equation

var.name: rech
var.description: recharge rate from unsaturated zone to groundwater(m H2O)

var.name: w
var.description: soil moisture for each UZ(Unsaturated Zone)layer,(mm H2O/ mm Soil)

var.name: wsat
var.description: saturated soil moisture, varied by soil types

var.name: wrsd
var.description: residual soil moisture, varied by soil types

var.name: k0
var.description: saturated hydraulic conductivity (mm H2O/hour) for each UZ(Unsaturated Zone)layer

var.name: alpha
var.description: soil water parameter, van Genuchten model's alpha

var.name: watern
var.description: soil water parameter, van Genuchten model's n
